description.p: Aasimars are mortals touched by celestial power, bearing a luminous spark and a healing touch.
Size. Medium or Small (your choice when you select this species)
Celestial Resistance. You have resistance to Necrotic and Radiant damage.
Light Bearer. You know the Light cantrip. Charisma is your spellcasting ability.
Healing Hands. As a Magic action, you touch a creature to make it regain {{proficiency}}d4 Hit Points. Once you use this trait, you can't use it again until you finish a Long Rest.
Celestial Revelation. Starting at 3rd level, choose a revelation that manifests your celestial nature (Angel, Scourge, or Fallen).
You have resistance to Necrotic and Radiant damage.
You know the Light cantrip. Charisma is you spellcasting ability
As a Magic action, you touch a creature to make it regain {{proficiency}}d4 Hit Points. You can use this trait {{proficiency}} times per Long Rest.

sheet.description: You restore {{proficiency}}d4 HP to a creature you touch.

description.p: When you reach character level 3, you can transform as a Bonus Action using one of the options below (choose the option each time you transform). The transformation lasts for 1 minute or until you end it (no action required). Once you transform, you can't do so again until you finish a Long Rest. Once on each of your turns before the transformation ends, you can deal extra damage to one target when you deal damage to it with an attack or a spell. The extra damage equals your Proficiency Bonus, and the extra damage's type is either Necrotic for Necrotic Shroud or Radiant for Heavenly Wings and Inner Radiance. Here are the transformation options:

sheet.description: For 1 minute you manifest one of the Revelations of your choice.

description.p: Two spectral wings sprout from your back temporarily. Until the transformation ends, you have a Fly Speed equal to your Speed.

sheet.description: You gain a fly speed = {{speed}}ft. Once per turn you deal {{proficiency}} extra Radiant damage to the target of one of your attacks.

description.p: Searing light temporarily radiates from your eyes and mouth. For the duration, you shed Bright Light in a 10-foot radius and Dim Light for an additional 10 feet, and at the end of each of your turns, each creature within 10 feet of you takes Radiant damage equal to your Proficiency Bonus.

sheet.description: You shed Bright Light in a 10-foot radius and Dim Light for an additonal 10 feet. At the end of your turn each creature within 10 feet of you takes {{proficiency}} Radiant Damage. Moreover, once per turn you deal {{proficiency}} extra Radiant damage to the target of one of your attacks.

description.p: Your eyes briefly become pools of darkness, and flightless wings sprout from your back temporarily. Creatures other than your allies within 10 feet of you must succeed on a Charisma saving throw (DC 8 plus your Charisma modifier and Proficiency Bonus) or have the Frightened condition until the end of your next turn.
